title: James A Garfield National Historic Site: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations       Official Videos & Multimedia of James A. Garfield National Historic Site   This page contains official park videos and multimedia created by park staff.  Please be sure to cite the park and the author listed if downloading and sharing these videos and multimedia.               Jay & Tom Garfield StoryCorps Interview   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:2 minutes, 57 seconds  Jay and Tom Garfield talk about working on the James A. Garfield National Historic Site in their twenties under their grandfather, James Rudolph Garfield II. Jay and Tom are the great-great-great-grandsons of the assassinated president. We hear from Jay first.This interview was recorded in partnership with StoryCorps.  Learn more at storycorps.org.
